meanings.definition: Autocatalyses: to catalyze a reaction in which the catalyst is one of the products
meanings.sent1: The chemical reaction autocatalyses itself, speeding up as it produces more catalyst.
meanings.sent2: The enzyme autocatalyses the formation of new molecules in the cell.
meanings.sent3: The potion autocatalyses so quickly that it almost seems like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for the project autocatalyses, inspiring others to join in.
meanings.sent5: The wildfire of creativity autocatalyses, fueling more innovative ideas.

meanings.sent1: The chemical compound autocatalyses, initiating a chain reaction within itself.
meanings.sent2: The reaction autocatalyses, creating a feedback loop that accelerates its progress.
meanings.sent3: The curious robot autocatalyses, constantly improving its own functions.
meanings.sent4: His excitement autocatalyses, spreading to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The plant's growth autocatalyses, thriving in its own self-sustaining cycle.
